title: A multitasking cleanser/toner that feels incredibly light on the skin and smells ever so faintly of rose petals.
description: It can be used as a pre-cleansing or pre-makeup step, a toner (that mildly hydrates and exfoliates), or a midday refresher. The possibilities!Get it from Soko Glam for $30.
